long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmark urls with parameters. Works similar to postman URL with parameters. The parameter value can be customised with Current Tab properties or JavaScript or JavaScript in current tab.

1. Create parameterised bookmarks that take different form in different tabs.
2. Empower bookmarks with runtime values from java scripts.
3. Copy some value from the current page and open a new tab with the copied value as query parameter.

Make your developer day easier by customising the bookmarks.

Documentation and source code:
https://github.com/palaniappa/smartbookmarks/blob/master/README.md
